```{r}
ELO = read.csv('C:/Users/zachl/Documents/FINALPROJECT/mlb_elo.csv')
ELO = ELO[ELO$season >1920,]
ELO = ELO[ELO$season <2020,]
ELO$RunDiff = ELO$score1 - ELO$score2
ELO$TotalRuns = ELO$score1 + ELO$score2
ELO$HomeWin = ifelse(ELO$RunDiff>0, 1, 0)
ELO$EloDiff = ELO$elo1_pre -ELO$elo2_pre
ELO = subset(ELO, select = -c(date,neutral,playoff,team1,team2,elo1_post,elo2_post,rating1_post,rating2_post,pitcher1,pitcher2) )
```
